summary:
### Chunk unknown — unknown

"{"
    echo "  \"title\": \"$title\","
    echo "  \"messages\": ["
    awk '
      function json_escape(str) {
        gsub(/\\/,"\\\\",str)
        gsub(/"/,"\\\"",str)
        return str
      }
      /^Human:/ {
        sub(/^Human:[ ]*/, "")
        printf "    {\"role\": \"human\", \"content\": \"%s\"},\n", json_escape($0)
      }
      /^Claude:/ {
        sub(/^Claude:[ ]*/, "")
        printf "    {\"role\": \"claude\", \"content\": \"%s\"},\n", json_escape($0)
      }
    ' "$input_file" | sed '$ s/,$//'
    echo "  ]"
    echo "}"

…
